attributes.action: Close pre-schools and nurseries with the new 2021 January 5th lockdown.
attributes.additional_details: To shut the nurseries and pre-schools down during lockdown too. Keep them open for the vulnerable children, special educational needs and children of key workers. Let the rest of them learn from home where it is safe.
attributes.background: On January 4th our government of England finally decided to close all primary, secondary schools and high schools. They stated to keep pre-school and nurseries open. All children of all ages are at risk of contracting COVID-19 and so all ages of education should shut and so are all teaching staff.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/566718
